citeinfo.origin: USGS compiled layers from CalFIRE perimeter mapping
citeinfo.title: FIRESTORM_2007_FIRE_PERIMETERS

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.2.1350

descript.abstract: San Diego County fire perimeters from the 2007 firestorm.
descript.purpose: This data set was created to provide general perimeters/locations of the southern California 2007 wildfires within San Diego County.

cntorgp.cntorg: County of San Diego Office of Emergency Services

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.1.1.3143

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

enttyp.enttypd: Fire perimeters from 2007 firestorm in San Diego County

attr.attrdef: Date when final perimeter of the fire was determined

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
